short_description: Internship and student management platform using React and Node.js.
long_description: A full-stack web application to manage student internships, roles, and company assignments. Features authentication, dynamic dashboards, and QA testing using Postman and JMeter.

short_description: University project for manual and automated QA testing.
long_description: Performed comprehensive software testing on LinkedIn workflows using Selenium IDE, JMeter, and Postman. Documented test cases, test plans, and executed both functional and regression tests.

short_description: Car rental app using Java and Firebase.
long_description: Developed an Android app for renting vehicles with Firebase integration. Implemented user login, booking flow, and vehicle availability management.

short_description: Personal portfolio website built with SCSS.
long_description: A responsive personal website showcasing projects and skills. Focused on clean UI/UX and accessibility, built using HTML, SCSS, and deployed through GitHub Pages.

short_description: IoT simulation for home automation using JavaScript.
long_description: Designed and simulated a smart home system including lights, sensors, and automation logic. Focused on modular control structure and user interface logic.

short_description: A complete car rental system using PHP and MySQL.
long_description: Developed a fully functional car rental system with a user-friendly PHP & MySQL backend. Enhanced user engagement by creating an intuitive UI using HTML and CSS.

short_description: Car rental app using Java, MySQL, and Firebase.
long_description: Developed an Android-based auto rental application that integrates with MySQL and Firebase. Implemented user authentication, booking administration, and vehicle tracking.
Build a website to highlight your programming abilities, experience, and portfolio. This is a great way to showcase your work to potential employers.
Create a web or mobile app to help users manage their tasks, set deadlines, and prioritize their workload. This project is a good introduction to frontend development and basic backend logic.
Develop a web-based or mobile calculator that can perform basic arithmetic operations. This project is a good starting point for learning fundamental programming concepts and user interface design.
Build a simple e-commerce website or app to sell products. This project involves frontend development, backend logic, and potentially database integration.
Create a blog to express your opinions, share your knowledge, or document your experiences. This is a great way to build an online presence and connect with others.
Explore game development by creating simple games using frameworks like Unity or Godot. This is a fun and challenging way to learn about game design, programming, and art.
Build a social media platform where users can create profiles, share content, and interact with others. This project can involve frontend development, backend logic, and database management.
Develop a music player or streaming app that allows users to listen to music, create playlists, and discover new artists. This project can involve working with APIs and media playback technologies.
Build a fitness tracking app to help users monitor their workouts, set goals, and track their progress. This project can involve data collection, analysis, and visualization.
